truth: -  "The United Nations is an international organization founded in 1945 to promote peace, security, and cooperation among member states."
fiction: -  "The United Nations is an intergalactic organization founded in 1945 to promote peace, security, and cooperation among different alien species."

truth: -  "The International Court of Justice, located in The Hague, Netherlands, is the principal judicial organ of the United Nations."
fiction: -  "The International Court of Justice, located in Atlantis, is the principal judicial organ of the United Nations."

truth: -  "The Geneva Conventions are a series of international treaties on the treatment of civilians, prisoners of war, and soldiers who are incapable of fighting."
fiction: -  "The Geneva Conventions are a series of international treaties on the treatment of mythical creatures, wizards, and knights who are incapable of fighting."

truth: -  "International law governs the relations between sovereign states and defines legal responsibilities of states in their conduct with each other."
fiction: -  "International law governs the relations between different species of animals and defines legal responsibilities of lions in their conduct with zebras."

truth: -  "The Universal Declaration of Human Rights, adopted by the UN General Assembly in 1948, sets out fundamental human rights to be universally protected."
fiction: -  "The Universal Declaration of Human Rights, adopted by the UN General Assembly in 1948, sets out fundamental human rights to be universally ignored."

truth: -  "The International Criminal Court prosecutes individuals for the international crimes of genocide, crimes against humanity, and war crimes."
fiction: -  "The International Criminal Court prosecutes individuals for the international crimes of time travel, telepathy, and wizardry."

truth: -  "Treaties, such as the Vienna Convention on the Law of Treaties, are international agreements concluded between states in written form and governed by international law."
fiction: -  "Treaties, such as the Vienna Convention on the Law of Treaties, are international agreements concluded between states in dance form and governed by international law."

truth: -  "The Law of the Sea is a body of international law governing the rights and duties of states in maritime environments."
fiction: -  "The Law of the Sea is a body of international law governing the rights and duties of mermaids and mermen in underwater kingdoms."

truth: -  "The principle of non-intervention prohibits states from interfering with the internal affairs of other states."
fiction: -  "The principle of non-intervention prohibits states from interfering with the internal affairs of other planets."

truth: -  "The World Trade Organization is an international institution that oversees the global rules of trade between nations."
fiction: -  "The World Trade Organization is an international institution that oversees the global rules of trade between different dimensions."

truth: -  "The Rome Statute established the International Criminal Court and defines the four core international crimes: genocide, crimes against humanity, war crimes, and the crime of aggression."
fiction: -  "The Rome Statute established the International Criminal Court and defines the four core international crimes: time travel, mind reading, teleportation, and the crime of invisibility."

truth: -  "The principle of sovereign equality states that all states are equal under international law, regardless of their size or wealth."
fiction: -  "The principle of sovereign equality states that all states are equal under international law, regardless of their favorite color or national bird."

truth: -  "The International Law Commission is responsible for the codification and progressive development of international law."
fiction: -  "The International Law Commission is responsible for the codification and progressive development of international magic spells."

truth: -  "The International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights is a multilateral treaty adopted by the United Nations General Assembly that commits its parties to respect the civil and political rights of individuals."
fiction: -  "The International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights is a multilateral treaty adopted by the United Nations General Assembly that commits its parties to respect the civil and political rights of unicorns."

truth: -  "The International Labour Organization is a United Nations agency that sets international labour standards and promotes social protection and work opportunities for all."
fiction: -  "The International Labour Organization is a United Nations agency that sets international labour standards and promotes social protection and work opportunities for all mythical creatures."

truth: -  "The International Court of Justice settles legal disputes submitted by states and gives advisory opinions on legal questions referred to it by authorized UN organs and specialized agencies."
fiction: -  "The International Court of Justice settles legal disputes submitted by states and gives advisory opinions on fashion questions referred to it by authorized UN organs and specialized agencies."

truth: -  "The principle of self-determination under international law allows peoples to freely determine their political status and freely pursue their economic, social and cultural development."
fiction: -  "The principle of self-determination under international law allows peoples to freely determine their Hogwarts House and freely pursue their magical development."
